text: Ara phira'a'unera lokadera theke ekajana bisbasi byakti ye tara imana lukiye rekhechila, balala -- ''tomara ki ekajana lokake hatya karabe yehetu tini balena, 'amara prabhu allahâ€Œâ€™, ara nihsandeha tini tomadera prabhura kacha the ke spasta pramana niye tomadera kache esechena? Ara tini yadi mithyabadi hatena tahale tini tomadera ye-sabera bhaya dekhana tara katakata tomadera upare apatita habe. Nihsandeha allah take satpathe paricalita karena na ye amitacari, pratyakhyanakari.
